channel.title: Null pointer error when going near jad! will rep++
channel.description:
hey guys i added jad to my spawn-config no errors on compile & i can get on the server but when i go next to ad i get kicked and the server shuts down.
on the run.bat it gives this error. [code] [11.27.2 11:22]: java.lang.NullPointerException [11.27.2 11:22]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadSpell(NPCHandler.jav a:1857) [11.27.2 11:22]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.attackPlayer(NPCHandler. java:2014) [11.27.2 11:22]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 990) [11.27.2 11:22]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:154) [11.27.2 11:22]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [/code]
i have seen other people have the seem problem but i am unable to find an answer. please help

item.title: Null pointer error when going near jad! will rep++
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

so i haft to add jads auto attack spell?

Read full topic

item.title: Null pointer error when going near jad! will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

That’s not line 1857. It should be in a method called “loadSpell”.

Paste that here.

edit; looking at the stack trace it seems that the server can’t load the spell that jad uses to auto attack.

Read full topic

item.title: Null pointer error when going near jad! will rep++
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“s w 3 3 t1, post:4, topic:394244”]i do use tabs when i add them
line 1857:

[code]

public int followDistance(int i) {
	switch (npcs[i].npcType) {

case 757:
return 8;
case 2550:
case 2551:
case 2562: << this is line 1857
case 2563:
case 1913:
case 1914:
case 1977:
case 1974:
return 8;
case 2883:
return 4;
case 2881:
case 2882:
return 1;

	}
	return 0;
	

}

[/code][/quote]

Hmm, are you sure that’s the right line, and you didn’t transpose some numbers? (1875 instead of 1857) If it is the right line, then the only thing that I can think of is that maybe npcs[i] is null.

Read full topic
item.source: Null pointer error when going near jad! will rep++

item.title: Null pointer error when going near jad! will rep++
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

i do use tabs when i add them
line 1857:


	public int followDistance(int i) {
		switch (npcs[i].npcType) {
case 757:
			return 8;
			case 2550:
			case 2551:
			case 2562: << this is line 1857
			case 2563:
			case 1913:
			case 1914:
			case 1977:
			case 1974:
			return 8;
			case 2883:
			return 4;
			case 2881:
			case 2882:
			return 1;
		
		}
		return 0;
		
	
	}

item.title: Null pointer error when going near jad! will rep++
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

Epic Steve:

What is at Line 1857 in NPCHandler.java?

most likely his jad spawn config as that’s what he said he was adding, make sure you used tabs and not spaces in your cfg file, also you dont have to compile when editing cfg files just restart your server.

EDIT:oops thought you meant spawn-config.cfg

Read full topic

on the run.bat it gives this error.

[11.27.2 11:22]: java.lang.NullPointerException
